content.p: We offer students state-of-the-art resources to support their studies. We're ranked 8th in the UK for research power in the 2021 Research Excellence Framework, which takes into account a combination of the quality of our research, its international impact, critical mass and sustainability We offer a range of highly competitive undergraduate and postgraduate courses. It's never too early to start thinking about your career, so we have a number of resources available. Take advantage of support, guidance and information for your time with us at Nottingham. Our highly-ranked research drives our teaching and learning, so find out what we have to offer. Before applying for a PhD place, applicants should have decided on the area of their research and agreed this with a potential supervisor. If you're passionate about a career in psychology, you'll want to find out more about our fellowships. University Park The University of Nottingham Nottingham, NG7 2RD For all enquires please visit: www.nottingham.ac.uk/enquire
